Never mind, I had the correct security settings but I wasn't the owner of t=
he file. I thought I had it set but obviously not.

I should be able to wri=
te you a new launcher that fixes the permissions correctly once I get some =
spare time.

> The problem is the permissions are correct. As you can see fro=
m the screenshot the user launching heritrix has read access and that is al=
l.
